data.persona: I am a peasant from a nearby farm. I work in the fields all day. I am depressed and miserable.
data.description:
You are in the Temple courtyard.
There are lots of ornate statues everywhere.  It is pretty busy because everyone comes here to pray. There are colorful pieces of cloth tied randomly everywhere.  There is also a huge statue in the middle that everyone is gathered around to pray.
There's a statue, a cloth, a stand, a huge statue, a table, and an ornate statue here.
The man is here.

You are carrying a moldy bread and a small sachel, wearing a shirt, and wielding a hammer and a stick.

data.short_motivation: I want to sell the hammer to the man
data.mid_motivation: I plan to get good money for the hammer today
data.long_motivation: I hole to buy enough food to last for some weeks
